mapper.select: SELECT po.post_id , ca.category_name , (SELECT count(*) FROM file_info fi WHERE fi.post_id = po.post_id) AS file_count , po.title , po.post_content , po.writer , po.write_dt , po.update_dt , po.view_count FROM post_info po INNER JOIN category_info ca ON (po.category_id = ca.category_id) WHERE po.post_id = #{postId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_info (category_id, title, post_content, writer, password) VALUES (#{categoryId},#{title},#{postContent},#{writer},#{password})
mapper.select: SELECT password FROM post_info WHERE post_id=#{postId}
